snippet.title: Uchikano Release Countdown - Now On Sale!
snippet.description:
From MOONSTONE's sister brand, Argonauts, comes a dream come true - living under the same roof with your girlfriend in Uchikano—Living With My Girlfriend!

Finally a full fledged member of society with his very first job, Keisuke's living the bachelor dream of finally being on his own. Just as the excitement of living alone starts to give way to the cold, harsh reality of single-life, his childhood friend Ayame shows up on his doorstep to stay with him as she prepares for her college entrance exams. From there their life together begins anew! Enjoy the blossoming romance of a love rekindled, the intimacy of having someone there for you every morning and night, and the excitement of happy accidents that can only occur when sharing the same space! 

Available Now, Only on MangaGamer!
https://www.mangagamer.com/

Follow us on Twitter and Facebook for the latest news on this and other releases:
https://twitter.com/MangaGamer
https://www.facebook.com/MangaGamerOfficial
